description:
Kei and Mizuho head to the beach for their honeymoon, but they soon discover that Kei’s friends are staying at the same hotel. They’ll have to stay one step ahead of them to avoid having their relationship discovered!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: So wie du bist, habe ich dich...
อาจารย์ที่เป็นแบบนั้น, ผม
そんな先生に, ぼくは
